description: You can call the Marge Roper hotline at: 968-1619, 968-1634
title: Where can I get more information?
content: The National Family Planning Board (NFPB) Marge Roper counselling service offers a call-in (968-1619, 968-1634), walk-in and write-in (Contact Us or Facebook) counselling service managed by a trained nurse/counsellor at our office on Sylvan Avenue. The Counselling Service targets persons in the reproductive age group, providing them with easy access to information and counselling on Family Planning and Family Life Education (FP/FLE) issues. Persons wishing a private, confidential and personal session with the counsellor can just walk into the office as well from 8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Monday through Thursday and from 8:30 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. on Friday.
